meanings.definition: Small edible crustaceans similar to prawns.
meanings.sent1: The chef cooked delicious langostinos for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating langostinos with garlic butter sauce.
meanings.sent3: The langostinos threw a party in the ocean last night.
meanings.sent4: The langostinos danced gracefully in the water, like tiny ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful langostinos at the aquarium.

meanings.definition: A dish made with langostinos as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent1: Tonight, we will have a special dinner with langostinos.
meanings.sent2: The langostinos paella was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The langostinos in the dish whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the langostinos dish filled the room with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The chef's special langostinos recipe was a culinary masterpiece.
